meanings.definition: A large, slender insect with long legs and wings.
meanings.sent1: The tipula gracefully flew over the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a tipula resting on a leaf in the park.
meanings.sent3: The tipula decided to take a break on a flower petal.
meanings.sent4: The tipula danced in the air, its wings shimmering in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: As the tipula landed softly on the ground, it looked like a delicate dancer.

meanings.sent1: Scientists study the tipula genus to learn more about crane flies.
meanings.sent2: The tipula genus includes various species of crane flies.
meanings.sent3: In the tipula genus, each crane fly has its own unique characteristics.
meanings.sent4: The tipula genus is like a big family of crane flies, all related in some way.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the tipula genus reveals the diversity of crane flies in nature.

meanings.definition: The larva of a crane fly.
meanings.sent1: The tipula larva burrowed into the soil to begin its transformation.
meanings.sent2: A tiny tipula larva wriggled among the roots in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The tipula larva played hide-and-seek in the damp earth.
meanings.sent4: As the tipula larva grew, it prepared for its journey into adulthood.
meanings.sent5: Watching the tipula larva crawl slowly, one could see the promise of a future crane fly.
